task.title: Obtaining a license for on Windows Server

context.p: To request a license, email support@datazone.com with the Server information displayed by the ’mmhostid’ command.

A license key will then be emailed back which may then be applied via the ’mmVisor’ Help
Apply license key menu.

ol.li:
Once MiramoEnterprise is installed on the Windows Server, log in as a user with Administrator privileges, start a console or powershell window and run the following command:
mmhostid hostid.txt
This will place hostid information into a file named ’hostid.txt’.
Email the ’hostid.txt’ file created in step 1 to support@datazone.com. A license information sheet will be emailed back containing a license key and instructions for applying the license.

Run mmVisor as Administrator and apply license:
Right-click on the mmVisor icon an select ’Run As Administrator’ to start mmVisor in admin mode (necessary to apply the license key).
Select Help
Apply license key from the main mmVisor menu.
If mmServer is running, you will be prompted to stop mmServer before applying the license key: click Yes to proceed.
When prompted to enter license key, copy and paste the license key provided by email into the dialog box, and click ’OK’:
When prompted, click on ’Yes’ to start mmServer with the new license:
